title: LPD: Father cleaning rifle, accidental discharge killed 5-year-old son
content:
LUBBOCK, TX (KCBD) -
Lubbock police say a father was cleaning his rifle when it accidentally discharged and a bullet hit his five-year-old son who was sitting in the next room.
It happened just after 6 p.m. Tuesday in the 2500 block of 71st near Trinity Christian High School.
The child suffered a gunshot wound to the chest.
The child was pronounced dead at Covenant Women and Children's Hospital.
No arrests were made.
The investigation is ongoing.
